SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PDATE AS PUBDATE, B.FPRICE, B.DPRICE, B.STOCK, B.DES, B.ORDER_COUNT, I.UUID, I.FILE_NAME, I.DOWNLOAD_URL FROM BOOKS B, BNO_IMG I WHERE B.BNO = I.BNO
AND ( LOWER(B.TITLE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchKeyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(B.AUTHOR) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchKeyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(B.DES) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchKeyword}) || '%' )
ORDER BY B.BNO OFFSET #{firstIndex} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageUnit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM BOOKS b JOIN BNO_IMG i ON b.BNO = i.BNO WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(b.NAT) = UPPER(#{nat})
AND UPPER(b.CATEGORY) = UPPER(#{category})

SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PDATE AS PUBDATE, B.FPRICE, B.DPRICE, B.STOCK, B.DES, B.ORDER_COUNT, I.UUID, I.FILE_NAME, I.DOWNLOAD_URL FROM BOOKS B JOIN BNO_IMG I ON B.BNO = I.BNO ORDER BY B.PDATE DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PDATE AS pubDate, B.FPRICE, B.DPRICE, B.STOCK, B.DES, B.CATEGORY, B.ORDER_COUNT AS orderCount, I.UUID, I.FILE_NAME AS fileName, I.FILE_DATA AS fileData, I.DOWNLOAD_URL AS downloadUrl FROM BOOKS B JOIN BNO_IMG I ON B.BNO = I.BNO WHERE B.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY B.PDATE DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PDATE AS PUBDATE, B.FPRICE, B.DPRICE, B.STOCK, B.DES, B.ORDER_COUNT, I.UUID, I.FILE_NAME, I.DOWNLOAD_URL, ROUND((B.FPRICE - B.DPRICE) / B.FPRICE * 100, 1) AS DISCOUNT FROM BOOKS B JOIN BNO_IMG I ON B.BNO = I.BNO ORDER BY DISCOUNT DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY
